original_text:
Captain’s Quest Treasure Island
Alla ricerca del tesoro perduto
Le storie di pirati sono tra le più affascinanti in assoluto, merito soprattutto di capolavori letterari come L’isola del Tesoro di Stevenson e di Peter Pan, di cui tutti ricordano Capitan Uncino e la sua ciurma, ma anche di film diventati dei classici come Pirati dei Caraibi con protagonista il pirata Jack Sparrow.
La ISoftBet è riuscita nell’impresa di creare una slot coinvolgente anche grazie a una grafica curata nei minimi dettagli. La griglia di gioco si trova sul ponte della nave mentre sta solcando il mare caraibico, mentre durante la giocata Bonus ci si sposta sull’isola deserta dove è nascosto il tesoro. I tasti che ci permettono di dare avvio al gioco sono posizionati sulla destra, con la parte sottostante destinata invece al variatore di puntata, al saldo e al conto delle vincite.
Ogni Spin è accompagnato da una musica tipica dei film pirateschi, indispensabile per far salire l’adrenalina e farci vivere un’esperienza ludica da sogno!
Un’infinità di modi per vincere!
La ISoftBet ha deciso di puntare su una griglia tradizionale, con 5 rulli e 3 righe su cui sono sistemate le 10 linee di pagamenti fisse. Per vincere è necessario creare combo di simboli identici a partire dal rullo di destra e procedendo verso sinistra. Il costo di ogni partita è abbastanza contenuto, con la puntata minima che parte da 0,10 € a salire. Con la funzione Autoplay invece possiamo impostare da 5 a 100 giri automatici che possono essere interrotti in ogni momento.
La volatilità è alta, mentre il valore RTP è stimato al 96%.
Un Wild tuttofare
Prima di vedere la funzione speciale di questa slot, diamo un’occhiata ai simboli che ci serviranno per formare le nostre combinazioni paganti.
I dobloni con i semi delle carte da Poker sono i simboli di minor valore, a salire troviamo il cannocchiale, il pappagallo, il timone e infine il tesoro.
Il simbolo del capitano ricopre la funzione di Wild e di Scatter. Si tratta di un simbolo a espansione, ciò vuol dire che quando atterra si estende su tutto il rullo. oltre a sostituire tutti i simboli, quando ne compaiono almeno tre, veniamo ricompensati con dei Free Spins. I giri gratuiti partono con un moltiplicatore x2 sui rulli in cui sono atterrati i Wild. Ulteriori simboli del capitano durante il Bonus incrementano il valore dei moltiplicatori. Questa funzione può essere anche acquistata attraverso il tasto apposito.

Domande Frequenti 
Quanto vale il ritorno teorico al giocatore?

In Captain’s Quest Treasure Island il valore RTP è del 96%.



Sono presenti Wild e Scatter?

Sì, anche se non ci sono due simboli differenti, essendo tutti e due legati al simbolo del capitano.



Posso variare le linee di pagamento?

No, in Captain’s Quest Treasure Island le linee sono dieci e fisse

raw_translation.response:
Captain's Quest Treasure Island
In search of the lost treasure
As an experienced gambler, you'll be intrigued by the pirate stories of Captain's Quest Treasure Island. From literary masterpieces such as Stevenson's Treasure Island to the classic films like Pirates of the Caribbean, we are all fascinated by Captain Hook and his crew. ISoftBet has managed to create an engaging slot game with highly detailed graphics. The gameplay grid is on the deck of the ship as it sails through the Caribbean Sea. The bonus round takes place on a hidden desert island where the treasure is located. The controls are on the right side, with the lower part for the bet selector, balance, and win count. Each spin is accompanied by typical pirate music to increase the adrenaline and give you an unforgettable gaming experience.
Infinite winning options!
ISoftBet decided to use a traditional grid with five reels and three rows, with ten fixed paylines. To win, you need to have combos of identical symbols starting from the right reel and moving left. The cost of each game is quite affordable, starting at 0.10 €. With the Autoplay function, you can set from 5 to 100 automatic turns that can be stopped at any time. The volatility is high, while the value of the RTP is estimated at 96%.
A versatile wild
Before delving into the special function of this slot, let's have a look at the symbols used to form our winning combos. The doblons with the suits of poker cards are the low-value symbols, while moving up the ladder you'll find the telescope, the parrot, the helm and finally, the treasure. The Captain sign serves the dual purpose of being the wild and scatter symbol. It's an expanding symbol, meaning it takes up an entire reel. As well as replacing all symbols, when at least three land on the reels, you're rewarded with free spins. The free spins come with a 2x multiplier on the reels where the wilds land, and additional Captain symbols can raise the multiplier value, which can also be purchased using a specific button.

Frequently Asked Questions
What's the theoretical payout percentage?
In Captain's Quest Treasure Island, the RTP value is 96%.

Are there any wild and scatter symbols?
Yes, although there are no two different symbols since both are represented by the Captain sign.

Can I change the paylines?
No, in Captain's Quest Treasure Island, there are ten fixed paylines.

Review: Captain’s Quest Treasure Island
Seeking the Lost Treasure
Pirate stories are among the most fascinating, thanks in particular to literary masterpieces such as Stevenson's Treasure Island and Peter Pan, of which everyone remembers Captain Hook and his crew, as well as classic films such as Pirates of the Caribbean starring the pirate Jack Sparrow.
ISoftBet has succeeded in creating an engaging slot, thanks also to a graphic design that is meticulous in every detail. The game grid is located on the deck of the ship as it sails the Caribbean Sea, while during the Bonus game we move to the deserted island where the treasure is hidden. The buttons that allow us to start the game are positioned on the right, with the bottom part instead dedicated to the bet selector, balance and win count.
Each Spin is accompanied by music typical of pirate movies, essential for raising adrenaline and giving us a dream gaming experience!
An infinity of ways to win!
ISoftBet decided to focus on a traditional grid, with 5 reels and 3 rows on which the 10 fixed paylines are placed. To win, it is necessary to create combos of identical symbols starting from the right reel and proceeding to the left. The cost of each game is quite low, with the minimum bet starting at € 0.10. With the Autoplay function, however, we can set from 5 to 100 automatic spins that can be interrupted at any time.
The volatility is high, while the RTP value is estimated at 96%.
A versatile Wild
Before seeing the special feature of this slot, let's take a look at the symbols we will need to form our paying combinations.
The doubloons with the poker card suits are the symbols of lower value, followed by the telescope, the parrot, the helm and finally the treasure.
The captain symbol covers the function of Wild and Scatter. This is an expanding symbol, which means that when it lands it extends across the entire reel. In addition to replacing all symbols, when at least three appear, we are rewarded with Free Spins. The free spins start with a x2 multiplier on the reels where the Wilds landed. Additional captain symbols during the bonus increase the value of the multipliers. This function can also be purchased through the appropriate button.

FAQs
What is the theoretical return to player value?
In Captain’s Quest Treasure Island, the RTP value is 96%.

Are there Wilds and Scatters?
Yes, even if there are not two different symbols, as both are connected to the captain symbol.

Can I vary the paylines?
No, in Captain’s Quest Treasure Island the lines are ten and fixed.
